Error in temperature rising of Fixing Assembly
Temperature of the Fixing Assembly did not reach a certain temperature within the specified period of time.
1. Check the connector connection between the Fixing Assembly and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Fixing Assembly. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Abnormal high temperature of Fixing Assembly
It was detected that the temperature of the Fixing Assembly was abnormally high.
1. Check the connector between the Fixing Assembly and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Fixing Assembly. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Abnormal low temperature of Fixing Assembly
It was detected that the temperature of the Fixing Assembly was abnormally low.
1. Check the connector between the Fixing Assembly and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Fixing Assembly. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in fixing power supply drive circuit
The zero cross signal was not detected for the specified period of time or more.
1. Check the connector connection between the Fixing Assembly and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Fixing Assembly. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Revolution of the ITB Motor did not reach the specified value
The cycle of the ITB Motor speed detection signal did not become the specified cycle since the ITB Motor started to be driven.
1. Check the connector between the ITB Motor and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the ITB Motor. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Revolution of the ITB Motor was out of the specified range
After the cycle of the ITB Motor speed detection signal became the specified cycle once, it deviated from the specified cycle.
1. Check the connector between the ITB Motor and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the ITB Motor. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.

Change in signal status of the Developing Home Position Sensor could not be detected although a specified period of time has passed after rotating the Main Motor for engagement/ disengagement operation of the Developing Cylinder.

1. Check the connectors connecting the Developing Home Position Sensor, Main Motor and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Developing Home Position Sensor. 3. Replace the Main Motor. 4. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Sufficient amount of light could not be received when detecting image density.
1. Check the connector of the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the ITB Unit. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB. 4. Replace the Toner Cartridge.
1. Check the connector between the Environment Sensor and DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Environment Sensor. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
1. Check the connector between the ITB Unit and DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the ITB Unit. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in Laser Scanner Motor or Laser Scanner Unit (Y)
Error in the BD detection value in the Laser Scanner Motor or the Laser Scanner Unit (Y)
1. Check the connector between the Laser Scanner Unit and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in Laser Scanner Motor or Laser Scanner Unit (Y)
Error in the BD detection value in the Laser Scanner Motor or the Laser Scanner Unit (Y)
1. Check the connector between the Laser Scanner Unit and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in Laser Scanner Motor or Laser Scanner Unit (C)
Error in the BD detection value in the Laser Scanner Motor or the Laser Scanner Unit (C)
1. Check the connector between the Laser Scanner Unit and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in Laser Scanner Motor or Laser Scanner Unit (Bk)
Error in the BD detection value in the Laser Scanner Motor or the Laser Scanner Unit (Bk)
1. Check the connector between the Laser Scanner Unit and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
The Laser Scanner Motor did not become ready although a specified period of time had passed.
1. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit. 2. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
The ROM of the DC Controller PCB failed to be updated.
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in writing/reading of main program in the Main Controller PCB
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Error in writing/reading of the setting values storage area in the Main Controller PCB
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Error in the nonvolatile memory on the DC Controller
The CIS Unit did not move to HP even it moved backward. Reader HP Sensor error, Reader Motor error, CIS Unit error
1. Replace the Reader HP Sensor. 2. Replace the Reader Motor. 3. Replace the CIS Unit. 4. Replace the Reader Unit.
The CIS Unit did not move to HP even it moved forward. Reader HP Sensor error, Reader Motor error, CIS Unit error
1. Replace the Reader HP Sensor. 2. Replace the Reader Motor. 3. Replace the CIS Unit. 4. Replace the Reader Unit.
Light intensity of the CIS Unit below the reference level
When the light intensity is below the reference level at shading
1. Disconnect and then connect the Flexible Cable. 2. Replace the Flexible Cable. 3. Replace the CIS Unit. 4. Replace the Main Controller PCB (PCB2).
Error in access to backup data for Reader (reading error at power-on)
The Reader-related adjustment values could not be read.
1. Clear the backup RAM of RCON. Execute COPIER > FUNCTION > CLEAR > RCON. 2. Enter all the values written on the service label in service mode again. 3. Turn OFF and then ON the main power.
Error in the One-Touch Key Cover Sensor
Error in the One-Touch Key Cover Sensor
1. Check the One-Touch Key Cover Sensor. 2. Turn OFF and then ON the power. 3. Replace the Control Panel.
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.

1. Check the connector connection between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB. 2. Install the set of the controller firmware. 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 4. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Communication error between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB occurred.

1. Check the connector connection between the Engine Controller PCB and the Main Controller PCB. 2. Install the set of the controller firmware. 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB. 4. Replace the Engine Controller PCB.
Communication error with CCU/modem NCU PCB type error
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the NCU PCB. 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Error in ROM for backing up fax data
An error occurred in ROM for backing up fax data
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Language file version was not matched with the main program.
Install the set of the controller firmware.
The size of the language file exceeded the upper limit.
Install the set of the controller firmware.
Versions of the main program and the start-up program were not matched.
Install the set of the controller firmware.

1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Check the DC Controller PCB. 3. Install the DC Controller PCB. 4. Install the set of the controller firmware. 5. Check the model code. (When the model code and the engine code are mismatched, E744-4000 occurs.)
Error in the Control Panel PCB
Error in the Control Panel PCB (microcomputer)
1. Check the Control Panel PCB, and install the firmware (PANEL). 2. Install the set of the controller firmware. 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Communication error with Wireless LAN PCB
Communication with the Wireless LAN PCB could not be established.
1. Turn OFF and then ON the main power. 2. Check the connection of the Wireless LAN PCB. 3. Install the set of the controller firmware. 4. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
An error in the microcomputer which retains fax job information of the Main Controller PCB
1. Install the firmware of BKUP. 2. Install the set of the controller firmware. 3. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Main Controller communication error occurred (other than scan).
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the Main Controller PCB.
Information at color displacement correction could not be obtained.
1. Install the DC Controller firmware. 2. Install the set of the controller firmware. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in power state of the Laser Scanner Unit (firmware-dependent)
1. Install the set of the controller firmware. 2. Replace the Laser Scanner Unit.
An error in connection occurred due to controller software.
Due to firmware error, the possibility of solving the error by replacing the Main Controller PCB is low. Check the installed engine again.
Fixing Power Supply Cooling Fan error
The Fixing Power Supply Cooling Fan failed to rotate at the specified revolution.
1. Check the connector between the Fixing Power Supply Cooling Fan and the DC Controller PCB. 2. Replace the Fixing Power Supply Cooling Fan. 3. Replace the DC Controller PCB.
Error in pressure release mechanism of the Fixing Assembly
Although the Fixing Assembly started moving to the home position, it failed to be at the position.
1. Replace the Fixing Drive Assembly. 2. Replace the Fixing Pressure Release Cam.
